sentences.english: The effects of tea fungus on the browning of fresh-cut potato were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 試驗研究紅茶菌液對鮮切馬鈴薯褐變的影響。

sentences.english: The Acetobacter xylinum and Schizosacchromyces sp. were isolated from tea fungus culture.
sentences.chinese: 從紅茶菌液中分離得到膜醋酸菌與裂殖酵母。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the regulative effect of black tea fungus on the immunological function of mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討黑河紅茶菌對於小鼠免疫功能的調節效用。

sentences.english: ConclusionThe black tea fungus can enhance the immunological function of mice significantly.
sentences.chinese: 結論黑河紅茶菌能顯著增強小鼠的免疫功能。

sentences.english: An antibacterial protein was extracted from tea fungus culture.
sentences.chinese: 從紅茶菌培養液中提取出抗菌蛋白。
